name: Ashrune's Ascension
description:
Ashrune's Ascension

Ashrune's Ascension is a Hack and Slash with some rogue-like elements that focuses on the rise of the Sword of Ashrune out of the Arena.  The game is in development, in Unity and it's being developed for PC with controller support.

The game will feature elemental battles where the player must choose elements to empower his sword and most complete the arena in order to win.

Development Team

  • Marcos Pêgo
  • Miguel Monteiro
  • Gonçalo Gaspar
  • João de Oliveira

Art Team

  • António Tereno
  • Ana Rita

Writing Team

  • Tiago Cuco

Installation Guide

After downloading the latest build unzip it into a folder and run the executable. The controls are available in the Settings menu.

After playing the game, please fill out this form : https://forms.gle/hDLGewPvJjZ3AKNd9
